Package org.jnosql.artemis

This package contains all comuns API to artemis.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttributeConverter<X,Y>
    A class that implements this interface can be used to convert entity attribute state into database column representation and back again.
    ConfigurationReader
    Reader class that given the annotation returns ConfigurationSettingsUnit ConfigurationUnit
    ConfigurationSettingsUnit
    This interface represents the Configuration Unit information.
    Converters
    The Converter storage
    EntityPostPersit
    When an entity is either saved or updated it's the first event to fire after the database action.
    EntityPrePersist
    When an entity is either saved or updated it's the first event to fire
    Pagination
    Interface for pagination information.
    PreparedStatement
    An object that represents a precompiled Query statement.
    PreparedStatementAsync
    An object that represents a precompiled Query statement.
    Repository<T,ID>
    Interface to generic CRUD operations on a repository for a specific type.
    RepositoryAsync<T,ID>
    Interface to generic async CRUD operations on a repository for a specific type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseMetadata
    This class is metadata to Database
    DatabaseQualifier
    Utilitarian class to select the Database
    Databases
    Class util for check some data during CDI Extensions for Artemis
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DatabaseType
    Defines the database type supported on Artemis.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArtemisException
    The root exception to Artemis project
    ConfigurationException
    The exception to read Configuration
    DynamicQueryException
    The root exception to dynamic query on Repository
    EntityNotFoundException
    Thrown by the persistence provider when an entity does not exist.
    IdNotFoundException
    When The Entity is converted to communication layer, this entity must have a field with Id annotation.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Column
    Is used to specify a mapped column for a persistent property or field.
    ConfigurationUnit
    Expresses a dependency to a configuration and its associated persistence unit.
    Convert
    This annotation enables the converter resource.
    Database
    The database qualifier used on Eclipse JNoSQL Artemis such as defines which interpreter will be used on Repository with Database
    Embeddable
    Defines an embedded field, that means all elements fields in the class will as converted as one.
    Entity
    Specifies that the class is an entity.
    Id
    This isn't a mandatory field, but when it define this field is a key.
    MappedSuperclass
    Designates a class whose mapping information is applied to the entities that inherit from it.
    Param
    Defines a param to a Query query.
    Query
    To run Query in Repository interface

Package org.jnosql.artemis Description

This package contains all comuns API to artemis. Artemis is a flexible and extensible ORM to connect NoSQL databases. It brings an easy interface to support key-value, column family, document oriented and graph databases using as base Diana in CDI based. The API's focus is on simplicity and ease of use.
  • CDI Based
  • Diana Based
  • Events to insert, delete, update
  • Supports to Bean Validation
  • ORM Annotation Based
  • Configurable and extensible
Developers should only have to know a minimal set of artifacts to work with the solution. The API is built on latest Java 8 features and therefore fit perfectly with the functional features of Java 8.
